Aug. 13, 1927 D Trawden Contest
Trawden Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
trawden-contest
None
Il Flauto Magico [unknown arranger]
Trawden, Colne, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £20, 2nd £12, 3rd £8, 4th £5. March contest - 1st(£2) Nelson Old, 2nd (£1) Colne Borough. 6th annual contest promoted by Trawden Agricultural Society. 4 bands competed.
Sept. 23, 2013, 8:24 p.m. Sept. 23, 2013, 8:31 p.m.
1 Nelson Old Clarence Smith
2 Colne Borough William Pollard
3 Blackpool Excelsior W. E. Taylor
4 Haworth Band Arthur Grace
